coded_answer.p: I am writing to thank you for the first prize in your competition and replyto reply to your letter.
First of all, according toin your letter you asked me my preferedpreferred travel dates. If it is possible, I would only like to travel in July because I am going to gobe on my holiday in July.

OnIn your letter, you are going to provid me one of tents and log cabins with accommodation at Camp California. I would like to be in tents because I can find it being in tents more comfortable than being in log cabins.

I am very happy because I can have a chance to do activities while I am at the camp. I would like to take part in the Golf and the sailing. I am not gootgood at botheither of them. I have been interested in them so I would like to turn up them on this chance.

Finally, I would like to know something about travel. Could you let me know whether I need extra money or what sort of clothes I need. I would also like to know whether someone will be at the airport for me because this will be themy first time in the U.S.A.
I look forward to hearing from you.
I was happy to get your letter. I haven't writenwritten a letter to you for ages. I'm sorry about that.
OnIn your letter, you want to hear about my experience at a pop concert. I'll tell you my experience aboutabout my experience helping at the pop concert.

At first, I applyedapplied for the volenteerto be a volunteer at the pop concert and then I got a responsibility for controlcontrolling the audience. I had to make the fanfans to keepkeep in a queue. I also makemadehelped them find their seats. It was very hard workingwork. For example, I always spoke loudly and runran fast.
However, there was something good tofor me. I saw a lot of singers and entertainers. I didn't need to pay an enterenceentrance fee because I was working there.
Plus, I got aan authographyautograph from a popular singer. I'll give you the authographyautograph foras a present. It is valuable of keeping on your suviniersouvenir.
I'll tell you more about the experience onin my next letter.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
